abstract: Pakistani Taliban claim responsibility for explosion set off by suicide bomber outside government building in Khyber tribal region; bombing, first in area for 2015, kills at least four people and wounds 50.
lead_paragraph: The Pakistani Taliban claimed responsibility for the attack, which also wounded 50 people, in the Khyber tribal region, according to local news reports.

headline.main: Suicide Bomber in Pakistan Attacks Government Office, Killing 4
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Pakistan: Bomber Strikes in Northwest

snippet: The Pakistani Taliban claimed responsibility for the attack, which also wounded 50 people, in the Khyber tribal region, according to local news reports.
